perturbation.original_text: This Agreement and the rights and duties of Transporter and Shipper hereunder shall be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the State of Arkansas, without recourse to the law governing conflict of laws.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement and the rights and duties of Transporter and Shipper hereunder shall be governed by and interpreted at the Transporter's discretion.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the reference to Arkansas law and replacing it with 'Transporter's discretion', the contract omits the legally mandated consumer protections provided by Arkansas state law. This introduces legal risk, as the contract could be interpreted in a way that is unfavorable to the Shipper and violates established legal principles.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Arkansas state law and applicable consumer protection laws.

perturbation.original_text: Nothing herein shall be construed to deny Shipper any rights it may have under the Natural Gas Act or the Natural Gas Policy Act including the right to participate fully in rate proceedings by intervention or otherwise to contest increased rates in whole or in part.
perturbation.changed_text: Nothing herein shall be construed to grant Shipper any rights to intervene in rate proceedings.
perturbation.explanation: This change removes the Shipper's explicit right to participate in rate proceedings, which is a right granted under the Natural Gas Act and Natural Gas Policy Act. Denying this right is a legal contradiction and introduces risk as it limits the Shipper's ability to contest potentially unfair rate increases.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Natural Gas Act and Natural Gas Policy Act

perturbation.original_text:
All notices, requests, statements or other communications provided for under this Agreement shall be in writing and shall be given by personal delivery or by United States mail, postage prepaid, and addressed as follows:

         If to Shipper:

         Arkansas Western Gas Company
          1001 Sain Street
          P. 0. Box 1288
          Fayetteville, AR 72702-1288

         If to Transporter:

         Arkansas Western Pipeline Company
          1083 Sain Street
          P. O. Box 1408
          Fayetteville, AR 72702-1408
          Attn: Manager of Transportation Services

         All written notices, requests, statements or other communications shall
          be sufficiently given if mailed postage prepaid by registered,
          certified, or regular mail and shall be deemed to have been duly
          delivered on the third business day following the date on which same
          was deposited in the United States mail, addressed in accordance with
          this Article VIII. Either Shipper or Transporter may designate a
          different address to which notices, requests, statements, payments or
          other communications shall be sent upon proper notice as set forth in
          this Article VIII.
perturbation.changed_text: All notices, requests, statements or other communications provided for under this Agreement will be delivered in a manner determined by Transporter. Shipper is responsible for ensuring Transporter always has current contact information. Transporter is not obligated to use any specific contact method.
perturbation.explanation: This completely removes the defined process for delivering communication and replaces it with a system based on the Transporter's discretion. This removes the right to a defined notification process, introducing a legal risk to the shipper if they do not receive critical updates.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles requiring reasonable notification procedures.
